text: Giancarlo Bergamini was an fencer from Italy. Bergamini competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics and the 1956 Summer Olympics and won one gold and two silver medals. He was born on 2 August 1926 and died on 4 February 2020.Giancarlo Bergamini == References == Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian fencers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Italy Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Milan
title: Giancarlo Bergamini
